name: 16.5.1 - Prevalence rate of bribery, by sex (%) - IU_COR_BRIB - Both sexes

source.additionalInfo:
Variable description: Prevalence rate of bribery, by sex (%) 
 
 Variable code: IU_COR_BRIB 
 
 Metadata available at: https://unstats.un.org/sdgs/metadata/files/Metadata-16-05-01.pdf 
 
 Detailed sources: UNODC and Islamic Republic of Afghanistan High Office of Oversight and Anti-Corruption (2013) Corruption in Afghanistan: Recent patterns and trends UNODC and INSTAT (2011) Corruption in Albania: Bribery as experienced by the population INDEC, Encuesta Nacional de Victimización 2017  en Argentina UNODC and Prism Research (2011) Corruption in Bosnia and Herzegovina: Bribery as experienced by the population  Institut National de Statistique: Base de données de l'Enquête sur les conditions de vie des ménages de 2013/2014: Module Gouvernance, paix et sécurité UN-CTS Ministry of Interior - Service Statistique Ministériel de la Sécurité Intérieure (SSMSI) Palestinian Central Bureau of Statistics,Perceptions Survey of Individuals on the Prevalence of Corruption in Palestine, 2013; PCBS_Database of Rule of Law and Access to Justice Survey 2018 UNODC and Central Statistical Office, Kurdistan Region Statistical Office and Commission of Integrity (2012) Corruption and integrity challenges in the public sector of Iraq UNODC and Prism Research (2011) Corruption in Kosovo: Bribery as experienced by the population Special Investigation Service of the Republic of Lithuania. The survey "Lithuanian Map of Corruption" Independent Commission Against Corruption of Mauritius. 2014 National Survey on Corruption UNODC and Prism Research (2011) Corruption in Montenegro: Bribery as experienced by the population Instance Centrale de Prévention de la Corruption. 2014 Enquête Nationale sur la Corruption.  UNODC and National Bureau of Statistics (2017) Corruption in Nigeria. Bribery: public experience and response National Integrated System of Criminal Statistics. 2017 Panama's National Crime Victim Survey Philippine Office of the Ombudsman. 2013 National Household Survey on Experience with Corruption in the Philippines; 2016-2017: Philippine Statistics Authority and Office of the Ombudsman. Annual Poverty Indicators Survey (Module on Access to Government Services) Anti-Corruption Commission of Timor-Leste. 2011 Corruption Perception Survey  UNODC and Statistical Office of Republic of Serbia (2011) Corruption in Serbia: Bribery as experienced by the population National Governance Peace and Security Survey 2017 (not yet diseminated) UNODC and State Statistical Office (2011) Corruption in the former Yugoslav Republic of Macedonia: Bribery as experienced by the population The Prevention and Combating of Corruption Bureau of Tanzania. 2009 National Governance and Corruption Survey National Commission for Police Reform. 2007 Study on Victimization from Crime and Perception of the Police.
